base_description: Rectangular wooden table with drawers and shelf.
part_description: Includes two drawers, two cabinets, and a lower shelf. Drawers and cabinets are symmetrically arranged on the front. The lower shelf spans the width of the table, supported by four legs.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide into the central compartment, flanked by cabinets with doors on either side. The lower shelf is fixed between the legs, providing structural support and additional storage space. The tabletop is secured above the storage compartments.
external_interaction_description: Used as a console table, it holds decorative items or essentials. The drawers and cabinets store small items, while the shelf accommodates larger objects. Positioned against a wall or in an entryway, it interacts with its surroundings by organizing and displaying items.
